Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/69th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Cumberland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
